presentation.title: Hi! My name is Anna.
presentation.description: I am a passionate web developer based in Strasbourg. I love building modern, responsive, and user-focused web applications.

stack.title: About me
description: I graduated with a Master’s degree in Computer Science from the National Aviation University in Kyiv (2023).
During my studies, I explored object-oriented programming, software architecture, algorithm design, and database systems — including design, management, and administration.

list.title: 2048 game clone
list.description: This is a full clone of the original 2048 game, built from scratch using JavaScript. I implemented the entire game logic: tile movements, number merging, scoring system, and game-over detection. The game is controlled via keyboard inputs. This project allowed me to improve my skills in DOM manipulation, event handling, and game algorithm logic.

list.title: Online tech store
list.description: This is the front-end of a commercial site built with React and TypeScript. It includes a dynamic product catalog, filtering, a favorites system, a shopping cart, search functionality, pagination, and responsive layout. I also integrated external APIs to fetch product data. This project helped me improve my skills in component-based architecture, state management, and API interaction.
